says: Workplace Standard First Aid is ideal for childcare providers, personal support workers, massage therapists, and RCMP. Many workplaces will also require this certification.
The certification is valid for 3 years. To renew, the course will need to be retaken in its entirety.
Workplace Standard First Aid requires participants to complete a 14-hour in-classroom session, spanning across 2 days.

Topics covered: Emergency scene management and PPE, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated external defibrillators (AED), Heart, breathing and stroke related emergencies, Wound care, head, neck, spine injuries, Environmental and sudden medical emergencies, Poisons
